DOC.detailed_description: Postoperative ileus ( POI ) temporary slow stop bowel function slow movement content intestine . This functional impairment persist variable duration follow surgery , usually resolve within 1 day small intestine , 1 3 day stomach 3 5 day colon . When POI persist 5 day , generally consider severe , sometimes refer complicate prolonged POI , increase risk related morbidity . This randomize , control , double-blind study design evaluate tolerability efficacy DAM solution treatment POI patient follow abdominal operation . It conduct multiple center China . A total 480 patient enrol study . Patient participation study last postoperative day 7 [ POD 7 ] , follow-up safety assessment occur 7 day operation.The treatment outcome measure include : 1 ) GI2 ( Time achieve recovery upper low GI function measure composite endpoint time first bowel movement time tolerate first solid food ) . 2 ) Time ready discharge . 3 ) Time first flatus .
